caption.p: ( a, b) Temperature dependence of the magnetic susceptibility χ for x = 0.34 and 0.41 single crystals measured by applying H = 1 T alongThe Ruddlesden-Popper (RP) ruthenates the ab plane and c axis, respectively. The blue dotted lines represent the ferromagnetic transition temperature. ( c, d) Magnetization hysteresis loops at different temperatures for x = 0.34 and 0.41 single crystals when H// ab. ( e, f) Magnetization hysteresis loops at different temperatures for x = 0.34 and 0.41 single crystals when H// c.
